required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib Combined With Allitinib in Lung Cancer
clinical_study.official_title: This Study is To Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined With Allitinib Tablets in First-line Treatment of Advanced No-small Cell Lung Cancer

brief_summary.textblock: This Study is To Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined with Allitinib Tablets in First-line Treatment of Advanced no-squamous and No-small Cell Lung Cancer with Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Mutation.

detailed_description.textblock:
This Study is To Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined with Allitinib Tablets in First-line Treatment of Advanced No-squamous and No-small Cell Lung Cancer with Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor Mutation.
This study is a single arm, phase II study, including 18 to 36 subjects; Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events 5.0 standard was used to evaluate adverse events of drugs, and Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors 1.1 was used to evaluated efficacy.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety and Efficacy of drug therapy
primary_outcome.description: The probability and severity of first cycle adverse events (AE) and serious adverse events (SAE) (based on Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events 5.0) and abnormal laboratory test indicators;

secondary_outcome.measure: The overall efficacy was assessed by the investigators
secondary_outcome.description: Objective response rate (ORR) assessed by the investigators

arm_group.arm_group_label: Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined with Allitinib Tablets
arm_group.description: Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule: Oral on an empty stomach, once a day, 1 capsule each time, orally for 2 consecutive weeks, stop for 1 week Allitinib Tablets：The dose of allitinib mesylate is 80 mg once a day, 2 tablets each time, taken orally on an empty stomach before breakfast. Take medicine continuously for 3 weeks (21 days) for 1 cycle.

intervention.intervention_name: Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined with Allitinib Tablets
intervention.description: Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule: Oral on an empty stomach, once a day, 1 capsule each time, orally for 2 consecutive weeks, stop for 1 week Allitinib Tablets：The dose of allitinib mesylate is 80 mg once a day, 2 tablets each time, taken orally on an empty stomach before breakfast. Take medicine continuously for 3 weeks (21 days) for 1 cycle.
intervention.arm_group_label: Anlotinib Hydrochloride Capsule Combined with Allitinib Tablets
